word:
I must now leave this subject and continue it again when my soul shall have rested awhile. I am weak under the pressure upon me. May the Lord give me grace to conclude this matter, 


                                     -69- 

is my prayer, in order that some souls shall refuse to be spoiled through the various turnings and twistings of falsehood.--Ms 35, 1906. 









Ellen G. White Estate 
Silver Spring, Maryland 
September 13, 1990. Entire Ms.
